article_title: Scandal-Scarred SAC Confronts Its Future Ahead of Criminal Hearing
article_text:
As the government pressure on SAC Capital Advisors LP intensified last year, the hedge-fund firm's billionaire founder, Steven A. Cohen, and his top lieutenants issued a consistent message to senior investment managers: "Put your heads down. Let's make money."

That refrain was delivered in a series of private conversations and impromptu meetings, many of the latter in Mr. Cohen's Stamford, Conn., office overlooking Long...

image.alt: Ex-SAC worker: 'How could I tell my kids I stayed at a firm that admitted to insider trading?'
